Title: Economic
Description: The goal is related to economic promotion, such as formal employment and local economy.

Title: Economic formal employment promotion
Description: The goal is to promote formal employment.

Title: Economic local economy promotion
Description: The goal is to promote local economy.

Title: Environmental
Description: The goal is related to minimizing and, if possible, avoiding environmental damage, for example, reducing CO2 emissions and waste or promoting resource reuse and energy efficiency.

Title: Environmental carbon emissions reduction
Description: The goal is to reduce Carbon Dioxide (CO2) emissions.

Title: Environmental energy efficiency
Description: The goal is to promote energy efficiency.

Title: Environmental recycling
Description: The goal is to promote recycling.

Title: Environmental resource reuse
Description: The goal is to maximize the reuse of resources.

Title: Environmental waste reduction
Description: The goal is to reduce waste.

Title: Innovation
Description: The goal is related to promoting innovation to achieve economic growth or efficient resources use.

Title: Social
Description: The goal is related to generating benefits for society, such as ensuring labor rights, promoting diversity and equal opportunities, and occupational health and safety.

Title: Social labor rights promotion
Description: The goal is to promote labor rights.

Title: Social SMEs inclusion
Description: The goal is to promote Small and Medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) participation.

Title: Social woman inclusion
Description: The goal is to promote women-owned suppliers' participation.
